Qixi Festival or Double Seven Festival on the 7th day of the 7th lunar month/girls' festival/Chinese Valentine's day, when Cowherd and Weaving maid 牛郎織女|牛郎织女[niu2 lang3 zhi1 nu:3] are allowed their annual meeting

sentences.english: My students have been working with the Star Festival.

sentences.english: The Star Festival is an all-Chinese myth.

sentences.english: One of the most popular is "Tanabata", or "Star Festival", which happens on July 7.
sentences.chinese: 7月7日這天的“七夕節”是最受歡迎的慶典之一。

sentences.english: Qixi immortalizes one moment that is ephemeral and fast fleeting.
sentences.chinese: 七夕使轉瞬即逝的短暫的時刻得以永恆。

sentences.english: They then tie the paper to bamboo branches on the evening of the Tanabata Festival.
sentences.chinese: 然後他們在七夕的夜晚將紙條綁在竹枝上。

sentences.english: Chinese Valentine's Day is the most a romantic holiday of traditional festivals in China.
sentences.chinese: 七夕節是我國傳統節日中最具浪漫色彩的一個節日。

sentences.english: Qixi is the origin of BOhai with splashing waters.
sentences.chinese: 七夕節的起源與濺渤海水域。

sentences.english: Valentines Day who is willing to do to me sing a song?
sentences.chinese: 是“七夕有誰願意爲我唱首歌”？

sentences.english: I will reflect on your own Daoxing, I Tanabata flowers a promotion.
sentences.chinese: 我就反其道行之，我七夕鮮花搞促銷。

sentences.english: The first episode features Qixi Festival and a culture gala will be thrown by the station in the holiday's honor.
sentences.chinese: 第一階段的七夕文化晚會將會在節日期間上演。

sentences.english: Tanabata Valentine's Day, she no longer sad.
sentences.chinese: 七夕情人節，她不再悲傷。

sentences.english: Is Qixi Festival more than a Chinese Valentine’s Day?
sentences.chinese: 七夕節僅僅是中國的情人節嗎？

sentences.english: Tanabata, painting a shadow lover to do.
sentences.chinese: 七夕，畫一個影子做情人。

sentences.english: Today is the seventh day of the seventh lunar month, so, it is called Qixi.
sentences.chinese: 今天是農曆的七月初七，所以叫七夕節。
